description: Try our easy to follow Honey & Ginger Chicken Bites recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Honey & Ginger Chicken Bites Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 long red chilli, thinly sliced diagonally
3 cm piece fresh ginger, peeled, finely grated

recipeInstructions.text: Combine honey, soy sauce, sesame oil and ginger in a glass bowl. Add chicken. Toss to combine. Transfer bowl to fridge to marinate for 1 hour.

Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a large baking tray with baking paper. Transfer chicken to tray. Roast for 25 minutes or until golden. Transfer to a platter. Sprinkle with spring onion and chilli. Serve.
